programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: A girl is trapped in a lake house with no way to communicate.

programme.title: Blue Eyes Of The Broken Doll [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An ex-convict, troubled by dreams that he strangles women, is hired as the caretaker. Soon after his arrival, a serial killer begins slaughtering women.

programme.title: Chopping Mall
programme.desc: Eight teenagers are trapped after hours in a high-tech shopping mall and pursued by three murderous security robots out of control.

programme.title: Into the Abyss
programme.desc: Trying to escape danger in a post apocalyptic world, Bannon realizes that his very existence will be put to the test.

programme.title: Alligator
programme.desc: A baby alligator is flushed down a Chicago toilet and survives, grows gigantic, escapes the city sewers, and goes on a rampage.

programme.title: Alligator II: The Mutation
programme.desc: A giant alligator runs amok in a small town lake.

programme.title: Day Of The Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: A military facility in Pennsylvania loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E1 - Witching Time
programme.desc: A 17th-century witch uses her craft to transport herself to the 20th century.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E2 - The Thirteenth Reunion
programme.desc: A reporter investigating a health farm stumbles upon a horrifying truth behind a secret society that is connected to it, and must now fear for her life.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E3 - Rude Awakening
programme.desc: A lecherous estate agent has recurrent dreams about his seductive secretary, a mysterious house and an even more mysterious encouragement to murder his wife.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E4 - Growing Pains
programme.desc: After the death of their young son, a scientist and his wife adopt a new son, but it coincides with a series of odd events and disasters for the father's research.

programme.title: Shark Killer
programme.desc: The services of shark killer Chase Walker have been engaged by his criminal brother. The gig: kill the shark that swallowed a valuable diamond during a gang transaction.

programme.title: Zombie Fight Club
programme.desc: Two survivors of a zombie attack are forced into a brutal battle against undead gladiators.

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation
programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill (1959)
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: Maniac!
programme.desc: A Native American travels around a resort town, murdering cops and rich people with a high-powered crossbow, while demanding that the town's richest residents pay him money to stop the killings.

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: The lone inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by an unstoppable street gang.
